Name: TatuBall: A Minimalist LoFi Puzzle
About the game: With puzzle gameplay in a relaxed atmosphere with LoFi music, you must help Tatu (an armadillo) to find burrows to survive during the seasons, but for that, you can only move when Tatu is stopped, and every new season, new challenges will appear. The gameplay uses the mechanic where you must choose a side to move, and you'll only be able to choose another side again after the Tatu/armadillo is stopped. Features: 40 levels, 32 normal and 8 extra. Different songs(LoFi musicstyle) by stages. Stages designed with a smooth learning curve, but with some stages that will challenge you more between each stage An experience designed in a pleasant environment and with music that helps to keep you relaxed.
